description: Wriothesley è il Duca di Meropide, noto per la sua forza e il suo controllo sul ghiaccio. Utilizza un catalizzatore per infliggere danni Cryo ravvicinati.
talents: Normal Attack: Forceful Fists of Frost
info: Wriothesley si basa su attacchi normali potenziati e danni Cryo. Priorità a CRIT, ATK% e HP% per massimizzare il danno.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Forceful Fists of Frost
skills.desc: Performs up to 5 consecutive attacks using frost-infused fists.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 5 consecutive attacks using frost-infused fists.
Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to perform a chain of quick attacks.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Icefang Rush
skills.desc: Wriothesley dashes forward, dealing AoE Cryo DMG.
skills.details_html:
Icefang Rush
Wriothesley dashes forward, dealing AoE Cryo DMG and enhancing his normal attacks for a short duration.

skills.name: Darkgold Wolfbite
skills.desc: Unleashes a powerful strike, dealing massive Cryo DMG to all nearby enemies.
skills.details_html:
Darkgold Wolfbite
Unleashes a powerful strike, dealing massive Cryo DMG to all nearby enemies.

passive_talents.name: There Shall Be a Plea for Justice
passive_talents.desc: When Wriothesley crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, he has a 10% chance to receive double the product.

passive_talents.name: There Shall Be a Reckoning for Sin
passive_talents.desc: Increases the CRIT Rate of Wriothesley's Normal Attacks by 10% during Icefang Rush.

passive_talents.name: The Duke's Grace
passive_talents.desc: Decreases sprinting Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.

constellations.name: Terror for the Evildoers
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Darkgold Wolfbite by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Shackles for the Unjust
constellations.desc: When Wriothesley uses Icefang Rush, his ATK is increased by 20% for 10s.

constellations.name: Judgment for the Guilty
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Icefang Rush by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Mercy for the Innocent
constellations.desc: When Wriothesley picks up an Elemental Orb or Particle, he regenerates 10 Energy.

constellations.name: Retribution for the Condemned
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Normal Attack: Forceful Fists of Frost by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Deliverance for the Redeemed
constellations.desc: During Icefang Rush, Wriothesley's CRIT DMG is increased by 40%.
